directions: Fill a 20 ounce glass to the top with ice. Pour in kiwi and lime syrup, carbonated water,  then top with orange juice. Stir to blend before enjoying this refreshing beverage.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger kiwifruit flavored syrup
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger lime flavored syrup
title: Kiwi-Lime Refresher
